message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point for us.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, Alice.
I understand you want a larger share Bob, but time is working against us both. This offer is fair and gives us both something.
Meet me in the middle, Alice. We both lose if we don't agree soon.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Let's end this before we both lose out.
